meanings.definition: Inspective: relating to or involving inspection
meanings.sent1: The inspective report highlighted all the details of the investigation.
meanings.sent2: The inspective process helped us identify the problem areas in the project.
meanings.sent3: The inspective squirrel carefully examined each nut before storing it away.
meanings.sent4: Her inspective gaze seemed to see through all the excuses.
meanings.sent5: The inspective teacher noticed every small mistake in the students' work.

meanings.definition: Inspective: characterized by close examination or scrutiny
meanings.sent1: The inspective detective solved the case by paying attention to every clue.
meanings.sent2: His inspective nature made him a great editor, catching even the smallest errors.
meanings.sent3: The inspective cat watched the fish tank with intense focus.
meanings.sent4: The inspective eyes of the artist captured every detail of the landscape.
meanings.sent5: The inspective scientist discovered a new species through careful observation.
